document.discussion_title: Exhibition: De Evolution By Luke Kirwan & Lyndsay Milne | Trendland
document.topic_text: Cyril Foiret French Trendsetter, living & working in New York : art direction, trend forecasting, styling and designing are part of my daily activities. PS: Sorry for my French, I don't pretend to be a writer and I know that my writing is not the best... Related News
